meanings.definition: Tippiest (adjective): having the most pronounced tip or point
meanings.sent1: The pencil with the tippiest point drew the finest lines.
meanings.sent2: She carefully balanced the tippiest part of the tower on her finger.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail was the tippiest thing in the room, always twitching with excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter reached the tippiest heights, echoing through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's tippiest peak was covered in snow, glistening in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Tippiest (noun): the highest point or peak of something
meanings.sent1: At the tippiest of the mountain, the view was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The tippiest of the tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The tippiest of the roller coaster ride made everyone scream with joy.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the tippiest of success requires hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The tippiest of the skyscraper disappeared into the clouds, touching the sky.
